At the UN General Assembly - Op Algemene Vergadering van de #VN #UNGA http://t.co/USZwcCTlSJ
'The abject act that took place at the Jewish Museum in #Belgium is connected to the events that are shaking up the world' #UNGA
'In Syria, Iraq, but also in countries like Algeria, terrorists murder innocent people every day' #UNGA
'No religion says you have to kill those who think differently' #UNGA
'We must, and we will, put these terrorists out of harm's way' #UNGA
'#Belgium has just decided to send six F16 fighters, in support of the fight against terrorism in Iraq' #UNGA
'Important Preventive Effort Must Be Provided to Prevent Jihad Candidates from Fighting Areas' #UNGA
'Military actions are not enough. We must focus on education, educational support, openness to others' #UNGA
'Strengthening the rule of law and improving living conditions are the best prevention of crises' #UNGA
'We must put the settlement of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict back on the top of the international agenda' #UNGA
'There will be no great human progress without a moralization of finance at global level' #UNGA
'Too many women and men do not have access to work or housing only because they are of foreign origin' #UNGA
'Too many women are victims of physical or moral violence only because they are women' #UNGA
'Too many LGBT people are persecuted and rejected only because they are different or otherwise like' #UNGA
'It is our responsibility to systematically denounce & fight against these injustices and human rights abuses' #UNGA
The inequalities in Belgium are the smallest in Europe, even if they are too large. This is due to the solidarity organized by the State
'We must remain vigilant so as not to fall into the trap of social regression and increasing inequalities' #UNGA
'The most powerful barrier against war and violence is human fraternity' #UNGA
